thread.title: BRIEF-Cheniere Reports Fourth Quarter And Full Year 2017 Results And Raises Full Year 2018 Guidance

title: BRIEF-Cheniere Reports Fourth Quarter And Full Year 2017 Results And Raises Full Year 2018 Guidance
text: 10 PM / in 8 minutes BRIEF-Cheniere Reports Fourth Quarter And Full Year 2017 Results And Raises Full Year 2018 Guidance Reuters Staff Feb 21 (Reuters) - Cheniere Energy Inc: * CHENIERE REPORTS FOURTH QUARTER AND FULL YEAR 2017 RESULTS AND RAISES FULL YEAR 2018 GUIDANCE * SAYS Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.54 * QTRLY REVENUE $1.75 BILLION VERSUS $572 MILLION * Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.37, REVENUE VIEW $1.58 BILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S * CHENIERE ENERGY SEES 2018 CONSOLIDATED ADJUSTED EBITDA $2.0 BILLION - $2.2 BILLION Source text for Eikon:
